insert into we_form(head_image_url, form_name, description, submit_text, submit_color, form_field_list_json, group_id, del_flag, corp_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, head_image_open_flag, show_sort_flag, description_flag, enable_flag) values
(#{entity.headImageUrl}, #{entity.formName}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.submitText},#{entity.submitColor}, #{entity.formFieldListJson}, #{entity.groupId}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.corpId}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.headImageOpenFlag}, #{entity.showSortFlag}, #{entity.descriptionFlag}, #{entity.enableFlag})
on duplicate key update head_image_url = values(head_image_url) , form_name = values(form_name) , description = values(description) , submit_text = values(submit_text) , submit_color = values(submit_color), form_field_list_json = values(form_field_list_json) , group_id = values(group_id) , del_flag = values(del_flag) , corp_id = values(corp_id) , create_by = values(create_by) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_by = values(update_by) , update_time = values(update_time) , head_image_open_flag = values(head_image_open_flag) , show_sort_flag = values(show_sort_flag) , description_flag = values(description_flag) , enable_flag = values(enable_flag)
mapper.select: SELECT wf.head_image_url, wf.form_name, wf.submit_text, wf.submit_color, wf.head_image_open_flag, wf.show_sort_flag, wf.description, wf.description_flag, wf.form_field_list_json, wfas.we_chat_public_platform, wfas.dead_line_type, wfas.custom_date, wfas.submit_cnt_type, wfas.action_info_param_json, wfas.submit_action_type, wfas.action_note_flag, wfas.tract_record_flag, wfas.customer_label_flag, wfas.label_setting_json, wfas.customer_property_id_json, wfas.timeout_hours, wfas.push_content_flag, woc.nick_name AS we_chat_public_platform_nick_name, woc.head_img AS we_chat_public_platform_head_img FROM we_form wf LEFT JOIN we_form_advance_setting wfas on wfas.form_id = wf.id LEFT JOIN we_open_config woc ON woc.corp_id = wf.corp_id AND woc.official_account_app_id = wfas.we_chat_public_platform WHERE wf.id = #{id} AND wf.corp_id = #{corpId}

SELECT (SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(1), 0) FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM we_form_oper_record WHERE form_id = #{id} AND external_user_id <> '' GROUP BY form_id, external_user_id) t1 LEFT JOIN (select 0) t2 ON 1 = 1) AS click_total_count, (SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(1), 0) FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM we_form_oper_record WHERE form_id = #{id} AND commit_flag = TRUE AND external_user_id <> '' GROUP BY form_id, external_user_id) t1 LEFT JOIN (select 0) t2 ON 1 = 1) AS submit_total_count, (SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(1), 0) FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM we_form_oper_record WHERE form_id = #{id} AND create_time BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} AND external_user_id <> '' GROUP BY form_id, external_user_id) t1 LEFT JOIN (select 0) t2 ON 1 = 1) AS today_click_count, (SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(1), 0) FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM we_form_oper_record WHERE form_id = #{id} AND create_time BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} AND commit_flag = TRUE AND external_user_id <> '' GROUP BY form_id, external_user_id) t1 LEFT JOIN (select 0) t2 ON 1 = 1) AS today_submit_count
